amendment.description: Amendment sought to affirm that state-run greenhouse gas programs would not be affected by the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-54 to clarify that the Agency can continue to provide technical assistance to states taking action to limit greenhouse gas emissions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (CT) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 240 (Roll no. 235).
